General.Name: iMBC Co.Ltd
General.Description: iMBC Co.,Ltd., operates as a digital content company in South Korea and internationally. It operates web www.imbc.com, a web platform; and m.imbc.com mobile platform, as well as Yo TV app. The company distributes contents, such as MBC TV and radio programs, movies, dramas, entertainment, real-time video clips, life, current affairs, news, sports, and self-produced web contents through internet, webhard, naver and other portals, wavve, Cable broadcasting, and IPTV. It also provides banners, video, voice, and mid-roll advertisements through various platforms such as web, mobile, MBC app, and MBC mini, as well as other promotional activities. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. iMBC Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation.
General.Address: Cultural Broadcating Media, Seoul, South Korea, 03925
